name: Legend of the Lost Island
description:
Ericku and Emi, both brother and sister set off a journey to a forgotten island after discovering a mysterious box after the death of their grandpa.

LEGEND OF THE LOST ISLAND is a new visual novel designed for the #DiveJam 2017, it features two relatives searching for the lost island. This theme depicts sea creatures, a little violence, and some whole-hearted traps.

THE THEME: One Breath (was not followed.)
